properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "count" FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , VIEW_COUNT , WRITE_DATE , NOTICE_YN , MN_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NO_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NO_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , VIEW_COUNT , WRITE_DATE , MN_ID FROM NOTICE JOIN MANAGER_INFO USING (MN_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
